plot: Zuko makes a decision about his future. Aang reunites with many of his old friends in a full-scale invasion of the Fire Nation capitol to coincide with an eclipse which will remove the Fire Nation's powers.

Zuko makes a decision that may affect his future with the Fire Nation. Aang and his friends reunite with their old allies in hopes of stopping the Fire Nation on the day of the eclipse and put an end to the war. When Aang and his friends reach the Fire Nation capitol it is soon discovered that Ozai and the rest of the inhabitants have anticipated the upcoming eclipse.—dawsonpersi
